data.name: Dress Smart (In Progress)
data.description: An unique, user-friendly app that combines real-time weather forecasting with personal wardrobe suggestions

data.name: NC NEWS API Backend
data.description: A RESTful API for NC NEWS, developed using Node.js, Express.js, and PostgreSQL, following Test-Driven Development (TDD) principles with Jest. The API provides several endpoints to facilitate various functionalities, including retrieving articles, posting and deleting comments, and updating article votes

data.name: NC NEWS Web
data.description: A reddit-like website that allows users to browse news articles by topic, to comment and delete their comments on articles, and vote/downvote on articles

data.name: Trailblaze Social Exercise App
data.description: A social exercise app where users can record exercises, set challenges for themselves and against friends

data.name: My Portfolio Website
data.description: Responsive portfolio website that showcases my projects and a little about me
